title: How to Make Corn Meal Mush

steps.headline: Place a saucepan on the stove top.
Fetch a whisk, wooden spoon and a bowl.
Bring mixture to a slow boil, and cook until thickened.
Switch to the wooden spoon.
steps.description: Continue cooking until mixture thickens. Cook the mush over low heat at just a simmer. Be careful as the mush spatters and can burn tender skin.

steps.headline: Spoon Cornmeal mush into a bowl while hot.
Serve with maple syrup, honey, or brown sugar.

text: Place a saucepan on the stove top.  Fetch a whisk, wooden spoon and a bowl.  Add water to saucepan.  Add salt.  Bring water to a boil.  Whisk Cornmeal into boiling water.  Bring mixture to a slow boil, and cook until thickened.  Lower the heat.  Switch to the wooden spoon. Continue cooking until mixture thickens. Cook the mush over low heat at just a simmer. Be careful as the mush spatters and can burn tender skin. Spoon Cornmeal mush into a bowl while hot.  Serve with maple syrup, honey, or brown sugar.
